description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
21 Lloyd Square, Islington, London, WC1X 9AJ

TPO Reference
T5 - Robinia of LBI TPO (No.371) 2007

PO Number
T080459

Work specifications
1 x Robinia (T5) as detailed in LBI TPO (No.371) 2007
Fell to ground level and remove stump

Decision:
Approve Subject to conditions
decision_conditions: Within one planting season of the removal of the Robinia a replacement standard flowering Cherry or Magnolia shall be planted in a similar location within the rear garden of 21 Lloyd Square.  It is advised that given the size of the garden that it would be more suitable to locate the replacement tree further from the rear elevation of 21 Lloyd Square.  The treeâ€™s location, confirmation of the species, supplier and size shall confirm to the Principal Tree Preservation Officer within 30days of the replacement tree having been planted.
